動物用藥品名稱: 維克犬貓狂犬病不活化疫苗
業者名稱: 臺灣維克法蘭斯股份有限公司
成分: COMPOSITION:FIXED RABIES  VIRUS PRODUCED ON HAMSTER  KIDNEY CELL LINE ,INACTIVATED WITH BETA-PROPIOLACTONE AND ADJUVED BY THE ALUMINIUMHYDROXYDE GEL. THE VACCINE  MINIMUM  TITER IS OF 1 INTERNATIONALUNIT.THE VACCINE RABIES VIRUS IS THE VP12 STRAIN.不活化前每劑量（1 ml）含有RABIC VIRUS≧10^7 LD50
